# convergenceTest

**Instance Property**

The convergence test to use for iterative solve methods.

## Declaration

```swift
var convergenceTest: SparseLSMRConvergenceTest_t
```

## Discussion

For [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMRCTDefault], iterations stop when:

- *‖ Aᵀ(b-Ax) ‖₂ < [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMROptions/rtol] * ‖ Aᵀ(b-Ax_₀) ‖₂ + [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMROptions/atol]*

For [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMRCTFongSaunders], iterations stop when any of the following occur:

- *‖ b-Ax ‖₂ < [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMROptions/btol] * ‖ b ‖₂ + [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMROptions/atol] * ‖ A ‖₂ ‖ x ‖₂*    (*‖A‖₂* is an estimate)
- *‖ Aᵀ (b-Ax) ‖₂ < [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMROptions/atol] * ‖ A ‖₂ * ‖ A-bx ‖₂*             (*‖A‖₂* is an estimate)
- Estimated condition of *matrix >= [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/SparseLSMROptions/conditionLimit]*

## Inspecting LSMR Options

- **atol**: The absolute tolerance (default test) or *A* tolerance (Fong-Saunders test).
- **btol**: The *B* tolerance (Fong-Saunders test only).
- **conditionLimit**: The condition number limit (Fong-Saunders test only).
- **SparseLSMRConvergenceTest_t**: Constants that specify the type of convergence test.
- **lambda**: The damping parameter lambda for regularized least squares.
- **maxIterations**: The maximum number of iterations.
- **nvec**: The number of vectors to use for local reorthogonalization.
- **reportError**: An optional error-reporting routine.
- **reportStatus**: An optional status-reporting routine.
- **rtol**: The relative convergence tolerance (default test only).
